post_title: (LOTG) 1909-11 T206 Fred Snodgrass - SGC GOOD 2 w/Severe Miscut
post_content:
An extremely rare severe miscut with a polar bear back.  Consigned to Love of the Game Auctions, and ending Saturday.  Any consideration appreciated!  

[URL="https://bid.loveofthegameauctions.com/bids/bidplace?itemid=31446"]https://bid.loveofthegameauctions.com/bids/bidplace?itemid=31446[/URL]
bump...auction ends tonight!  thanks for looking.
